snippet.title: Teachable Moments Seen In Palin, Rihanna Cases
snippet.description:
Teachable Moments Seen In Palin, Rihanna Cases
By The Associated Press 05:47 PM EDT 03/13/09
They're nothing alike, yet Bristol Palin and Rihanna are both used for 'teachable moments'
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10472223/1/teachable-moments-seen-in-palin-rihanna-cases.html
